title: A Quantum Model for Constrained Markowitz Modern Portfolio Using Slack Variables to Process Mixed-Binary Optimization under QAOA
summary: Effectively encoding inequality constraints is a primary obstacle in applying quantum algorithms to financial optimization. A quantum model for Markowitz portfolio optimization is presented that resolves this by embedding slack variables directly into the problem Hamiltonian.
